remarks: There is a bijection between words of length two with a fixed first symbol contained in a pair and the symbols contained in a pair together with the fixed symbol.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Jul-2018.)
statement:
wrd2f1tovbij $p |- ( ( V e. Y /\ P e. V ) -> E. f f : { w e. Word V | ( ( # ` w ) = 2 /\ ( w ` 0 ) = P /\ { ( w ` 0 ) , ( w ` 1 ) } e. X ) } -1-1-onto-> { n e. V | { P , n } e. X } ) $.
$d P f n w $.
$d V f n w $.
$d X f n w $.
